name: SearchSquareEvents
description:
Search for Square API events within a specified timeframe.

Use this tool to find events from the Square API that have occurred within a 28-day period. Ideal for tracking event history and obtaining specific event details.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for retrieving the next set of events from a previous search query.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint. Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of events for your original query.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: maximum_events_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of events to return per page, up to 100.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of events to return in a single page. The response might contain fewer events. The default value is 100, which is also the maximum allowed value.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

Default: 100

parameters.name: filter_event_types
parameters.description: A list of event types to filter the search results by. Each event type should be a string.

parameters.name: merchant_ids_filter
parameters.description: An array of merchant IDs used to filter events by merchant.

parameters.name: filter_by_location_ids
parameters.description: An array of location IDs to filter events by specific locations.

parameters.name: time_range_start
parameters.description: Datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating the start of the event timeframe.

value_schema.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
starts.

parameters.name: end_time_range
parameters.description: A datetime in RFC 3339 format marking the end of the time range for the event search.

value_schema.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
ends.

parameters.name: sort_key_for_event_search
parameters.description: Set the key by which to sort the returned events. Options include 'DEFAULT'.

value_schema.description: Specifies the sort key for events returned from a search.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specify the order (chronological or alphabetical) for sorting results. Choose 'ASC' for ascending or 'DESC' for descending order.

value_schema.description: The order (e.g., chronological or alphabetical) in which results from a request are returned.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint. Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of events for your original query.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint. Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of events for your original query.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
The maximum number of events to return in a single page. The response might contain fewer events. The default value is 100, which is also the maximum allowed value.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

Default: 100

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of events to return in a single page. The response might contain fewer events. The default value is 100, which is also the maximum allowed value.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

Default: 100

parameters.name: query.filter.created_at.start_at
parameters.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
starts.

value_schema.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
starts.

parameters.name: query.filter.created_at.end_at
parameters.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
ends.

value_schema.description:
A datetime value in RFC 3339 format indicating when the time range
ends.

parameters.name: query.sort.field
parameters.description: Specifies the sort key for events returned from a search.

value_schema.description: Specifies the sort key for events returned from a search.

parameters.name: query.sort.order
parameters.description: The order (e.g., chronological or alphabetical) in which results from a request are returned.

value_schema.description: The order (e.g., chronological or alphabetical) in which results from a request are returned.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
